prompt_base: photograph of a short, highly muscular martial arts monk, completely bald head, six distinct incense burn scars on forehead, determined expression, 8k cinematic photo, dynamic lighting
feature_prompt: subtle light reflection on the burn scars, defined muscles, realistic fabric texture on gi, aged weathered skin, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic texture, large nose, six dots missing, perfect skin, smooth head, helmet hair, flat lighting, low quality, blurry, (hair:1.5)
